title: 999 Normal wins, I request the Rioter that made Fizz please
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/XP58QzP.jpg)

I've finally reached 999 wins and wish to request the Rioter(s) who made Fizz (FeralPony/Xypherous) to play for my 1000th win.

I'm literally the biggest Fizz fan in the world having obtained [multiple Fizz plushies](http://i.imgur.com/73DKAYX.jpg), designing my own [Tundra and Fisherman Fizz costumes](http://i.imgur.com/5HabjkR.jpg) from scratch, and owning other miscellaneous Fizz memorabilia [such as this little statue](http://i.imgur.com/l9gIUWY.jpg).

It would mean everything to me if you were able to do this ♥

http://i.imgur.com/sJnmIvn.jpg

I remember this kind of thread was made a couple years ago, except for Jinx.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4229602&page=3

http://i.imgur.com/G7eiVR4.jpg

EDIT: A couple people wanted the thread preview image, so [here is the full version of it](http://i.imgur.com/8aVLtSF.jpg) for others in the future that would like it as well.

replies.body: I love how your top 3 champs are all water/fish based champs.

> [{quoted}](name=Jax in a Box,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-10T04:04:46.412+0000)
>
> I love how your top 3 champs are all water/fish based champs.

I'm practically a fish irl given how much I love to swim ><>
waterproof computer and a snorkel. Live underwater.
Dump the snorkel and get gills.
Nami shall bestow upon thee the sacred "+1". Go forth, faithful servant of the sea, and let this gift aid you in your quest.

I love how the post right under yours is: We all agree we hate Fizz right?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Come on Rito, just do it!
https://media.giphy.com/media/87xihBthJ1DkA/giphy.gif

Hey Tundra Fizz :)

No guarantees, but I'll see if I can find the designer for you! Fizz was before my time, so I'm not 100% sure who worked on him :D

If nothing else, I'd be willing to play with you!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hey thanks :D

Actually he replied to me on ask.fm not too long ago, letting me know that he sent me a friend invite last night. Though that was sent after I logged off and I'm currently away from home, unable to get back on until later tonight. I'm sure you can join our game if you want c:

Oh yay! I'm glad he replied!

I'll ask him for when you guys are playing and see if I can join! :D

Just want to say I appreciate the integration of staff and players. It definitely warms my heart seeing Rioteers ganging up with their players out on the Rift. You guys keep doing you and have a great time out there during your match!

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=00450000,timestamp=2016-02-11T21:00:51.234+0000)
>
> Hey thanks :D
> 
> Actually he replied to me on ask.fm not too long ago, letting me know that he sent me a friend invite last night. Though that was sent after I logged off and I'm currently away from home, unable to get back on until later tonight. I'm sure you can join our game if you want c:

Thats cool XD

When he's a Fizz main, but you also support his cause.

http://m.memegen.com/to2kx8.jpg

I want to upvote you but you're literally my mortal enemy mid lane and I hate you... >:(

But I'll upvote anyways. Hope it works out.

Oh, the irony.
http://puu.sh/n2T9a/4ed2cc6da8.png
Upvote this. Post it on Reddit. Post it on youtube. Get that rioter's freaking attention and have that rioter stream it!

> [{quoted}](name=MrNuclearPumpkin,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-02-10T06:37:01.262+0000)
>
> Upvote this. Post it on Reddit. Post it on youtube. Get that rioter's freaking attention and have that rioter stream it!

Well my thread got like 26 upvotes with 86% upvoted in just a few minutes, but was soon deleted. I have no idea why it was even deleted.

I hate Reddit...

> [{quoted}](name=Tundra Fizz,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2016-02-10T07:34:03.934+0000)
>
> Well my thread got like 26 upvotes with 86% upvoted in just a few minutes, but was soon deleted. I have no idea why it was even deleted.
> 
> I hate Reddit...

Ask.fm/riotferalpony
Mods remove personal stories to prevent ranty posts. Sadly, this means posts like yours are nuked as well.
Up you go.
How do you sleep at night?

> [{quoted}](name=Bladerunner7777,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=0039,timestamp=2016-02-11T00:21:01.640+0000)
>
> How do you sleep at night?

In a really comfortable bed with nice music playing in the background.
Yoshi tryna act sneaky ;)

I hope you get to play that game! {{champion:105}} 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Good luck man, I'm a [pretty big Fizz](http://s28.postimg.org/dni6iqaq5/Fizz_Main.png) fan too but don't main him anymore.

I made a Fizz batik (I'll link it when I get home), have over 200k mastery (another in my top 3 has 30k), and made a [45-page Fizz guide](http://www.lolking.net/guides/366494/preview) on lolking.

For the sake of all Fizz lovers, let this post be upvoted (also Fizz haters because you're like 95% of the community and he still needs your votes)!

As long as this doesn't start a chain of "I've almost got 1000 wins rito pls"...
Which it likely will, so it shouldn't be done.

Similar things happened with the "I'm one RP off from (skin), Riot please look at this drawing"

> [{quoted}](name=VulDread,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=0040,timestamp=2016-02-11T05:01:50.058+0000)

"tradition".
But ok

> [{quoted}](name=VulDread,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=004000000000,timestamp=2016-02-11T08:26:50.144+0000)
>
> "tradition".
> But ok

I'm guessing you're kind of new to the forums/boards if you've never heard of it, so here are some more links. This time from 2014 and 2013:

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2jwva0/1000_normal_wins/

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4060002&page=2#post43359398

Not new, I've played since Vi release.

It's not really a tradition.
It's not consistently occuring at set intervals, it's not related to customs or beliefs, and it isn't being transferred between generations.

A somewhat common occurence yes, but not a tradition

You MONSTER.

Riot, play with this person already so I never have to see this again. I know I'm a horrible person, but even I have my limits...

...kappa?

Have you played 999 Fizz games?

Or *MORE*?

> [{quoted}](name=Epjest,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Z70eNus1,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-02-10T07:45:49.824+0000)
>
> Have you played 999 Fizz games?
> 
> Or *MORE*?

I have no idea, I wish Riot recorded normal stats D:

Though I'm sure I've played at least 1,000 Fizz games in my life
I have 3k+ wins and have never played with a rioter.

plz stop being a jerk, we're all bound to change our mains after champs update rework our loved ones (='/ rip birdy gal, never forget), i pray that you choose to drop the drug that this fishy character is and go find another main, what about ehhh urgot? he/it is fun, bet you'll love this new challenge
